bug.author: WuTheFWasThat
bug.description: The docs for constant_initializer fail to correctly close a code block in one of the examples. As a result, many other sections are displayed in raw markdown. See: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/api_docs/python/state_ops.html#constant_initializer>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/api_docs/python/state_ops.html#constant_initializer</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Is it fixed now? it looks ok to me.
